notes: Fully rigged T-pose basemesh includes both male and female. Excellent base body candidate. By Niclas.

asset_name: Male Body Muscular System - Anatomy Study
notes: High poly anatomy study by Ruslan Gadzhiev. Need to verify if muscles are separate meshes.

asset_name: Female Body Muscular System - Anatomy Study
notes: Female muscular anatomy study by Ruslan Gadzhiev. ZBrush sculpt.
Low-poly muscular male by CharacterZone. Good for base mesh. AR/VR ready.
High detail simplified musculature by Alexander. Outer muscles only. Check license.

asset_name: Rigged low poly male & female figures
notes: Fully rigged with IK chains by Drazen. Good low-poly option.
Rigged female body by camilooh. Check exact license.
Rigged male basemesh by Malbeasy. Good starting point.
Open source anatomy based on BodyParts3D. Individual parts as separate objects. Full musculature available. Needs Blender export to GLB.
Professional grade by 3D4SCI. Objects grouped and named. Muscles organized by body region. Within budget.
136 separate parts. Each muscle separate mesh. Good for highlighting.
Includes musculature_separate_muscles.obj with named muscles. Also skeleton_separate_bones.obj.
Stylized low-poly human. Not anatomically detailed but good for placeholder.
Versatile basemesh pack by lzyassoul. Both male and female rigged.
76k+ downloads. Check exact license terms for commercial use.
Interactive anatomy atlas. Source files on GitHub. Derived from BodyParts3D.
